data.decision: Implemented V4 homepage as new component set rather than modifying existing components
data.rationale: Creating a parallel set of V4 components (home-v4/) preserves the existing homepage components for comparison and rollback. This allows A/B testing potential and keeps the codebase clean. The original components in home/ can be removed later if V4 is approved.
data.context: Built 8 new React components following Dark Luxury design patterns: sharp corners (no border-radius), bordered containers, gold-only accent color, Playfair Display headlines. All components use existing design tokens from tokens.css.
